TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit MessageQueueAccessControlEntry extends System.Messaging.AccessControlEntry

summary.span: 为受信者（用户、组或计算机）指定执行消息队列任务的访问权限。

span.span: Specifies access rights for a trustee (user, group, or computer) to perform Message Queuing tasks.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用类，以指定要应用于受信者权限。Use the class to specify rights to apply to a trustee. 这些权限包括扫视、 接收或发送消息;查看或修改队列属性或权限;和删除队列。These rights include peeking, receiving, or sending messages; viewing or modifying queue properties or permissions; and deleting queues. 类的方法提供此类的实例传递直接传入该方法，或将它添加到的实例的重载，以便您可以一次添加多个受信者的权限。The class's method provides overloads for passing an instance of this class directly into the method, or adding it to an instance of so that you can add rights for more than one trustee at a time. 新的访问权限将追加到队列的自由访问控制列表 (DACL)，它标识的用户和组可以访问队列的末尾。The new access right is appended to the end of the queue's discretionary access control list (DACL), which identifies the users and groups that can access the queue. 有关于添加新权限的位置和其效果此泛化一些例外情况。There are some exceptions to this generalization about where the new right is added and its effects. 有关详情，请参阅。For more information, see . 重载构造函数允许你指定成员，以指示是否允许或拒绝对受信者权限。An overload of the constructor allows you specify a member to indicate whether to allow or deny rights to the trustee. 允许或拒绝中资源的 DACL 权限的顺序会影响是否受信者具有指定的权限。The order in which rights are allowed or denied in the resource's DACL affects whether the trustee has the specified rights. 例如，如果受信者已被授予权限，并且需要更高版本中添加项表明拒绝这些、 系统首先查找授予的权限、 将向用户授予权限，因此你可能已考虑他们将被拒绝。For example, if rights have already been granted to the trustee and you later add an entry that denies them, the system finds the granted rights first, so the user is granted rights you might have intended they be denied. 你可以使用两个条目类型来重写此行为：`Set`和`Revoke`。You can use two entry types to override this behavior: `Set` and `Revoke`. 有关控制权限确定中的访问权限的方式的详细信息，请参阅枚举主题。For more information about controlling the way in which access rights are determined, see the enumeration topic. 类是关联与基于访问控制列表 (Acl)，可用于向用户授予访问消息队列系统本身的安全性。The class is associated with security based on access control lists (ACLs), which you can use to give users access to the Message Queuing system itself. 这是不同于代码访问安全性，这通过实现和相关类。This is different from code access security, which is implemented through the and related classes. 消息队列代码访问安全性定义队列特定操作或应用程序可能需要即安全控制; 进行的队列访问它不表示要执行这些操作或接收中和其自身的访问的应用程序的权限。Message Queuing code access security defines queue-specific operations or queue access that an application might require which is subject to security control; it does not represent a right for the application to perform these operations or receive access in and of itself. 请参阅主题[ [ \] ](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/23a20143-241d-4fe5-9d9f-3933fd594c03)有关代码访问安全性的详细信息。See the topic [[\]](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/23a20143-241d-4fe5-9d9f-3933fd594c03) for more information about code access security. 若要设置受信者的消息队列权限，请创建的新实例类并将它传递到的重载构造函数。To set message queue permissions for a trustee, create a new instance of the class and pass it into an overload of the constructor. 指定的消息队列访问权限由的实例传递到构造函数或通过设置在现有的属性实例。Specify the message queue access rights either by passing an instance of into the constructor or by setting the property on an existing instance. 然后可以将传递实例直接传入方法，或者将条目添加到的实例或之前调用。You can then pass the instance directly to the method, or alternately add the entry to an instance of before calling .

summary.span: 通过指定的受信者和消息队列访问权限初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified trustee and Message Queuing access rights.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Messaging.Trustee trustee, valuetype System.Messaging.MessageQueueAccessRights rights) cil managed

param.name: trustee
param.span: 指定用户、组、计算机、域或别名的 。

span.span: A that specifies a user, group, computer, domain, or alias.

param.name: rights
param.span: 值的按位组合，定义要授予受信者的权限组合。

span.span: A bitwise combination of the values which defines the combination of rights to grant to the trustee.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例，并且向指定受信者授予指定的消息队列访问权限。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class, granting the specified Message Queuing access rights to the specified trustee.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此重载的构造函数为指定的受信者授予权限。Use this overload of the constructor to grant rights to the specified trustee. 在指定的权限`rights`参数是的成员的按位组合位标志，其中包括此类权限在接收消息，删除队列，并设置队列的属性。The rights you specify in the `rights` parameter are a bitwise combination of members of the bitflag, which includes such rights as receiving messages, deleting queues, and setting queue properties. 此构造函数使用传递中设置此实例的权限属性。The constructor uses the rights you pass in to set this instance's property. 传递的此实例直接插入的重载方法可以仅向该受信者，授予权限，或添加到此实例之前调用以授予或拒绝向多个受信者的权限一次。Pass this instance of directly into an overload of the method to grant rights only to this trustee, or add this instance to a before calling to grant or deny rights to multiple trustees at once.

MemberSignature.Value: public MessageQueueAccessControlEntry (System.Messaging.Trustee trustee, System.Messaging.MessageQueueAccessRights rights, System.Messaging.AccessControlEntryType entryType);

.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Messaging.Trustee trustee, valuetype System.Messaging.MessageQueueAccessRights rights, valuetype System.Messaging.AccessControlEntryType entryType) cil managed

param.name: trustee
param.span: 指定用户、组、计算机、域或别名的 。

span.span: A that specifies a user, group, computer, domain, or alias.

param.name: rights
param.span: 值的按位组合，定义要授予受信者的权限组合。

span.span: A bitwise combination of the values which defines the combination of rights to grant to the trustee.

param.name: entryType
param.span: 值之一，指定是允许、拒绝、设置还是撤消指定的权限。

span.span: One of the values, which specifies whether to allow, deny, set or revoke the specified rights.

summary.span: 通过指定的受信者和消息队列访问权限，初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class, with the specified trustee and Message Queuing access rights.

summary.span: 传入的项类型定义访问的类型（例如 或 ）。

span.span: The type of access (such as or ) is defined by the entry type you pass in.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此重载的构造函数以授予或拒绝对指定的受信者权限。Use this overload of the constructor to grant or deny rights to the specified trustee. 在指定的权限`rights`参数是的成员的按位组合位标志，其中包括此类权限在接收消息，删除队列，并设置队列的属性。The rights you specify in the `rights` parameter are a bitwise combination of members of the bitflag, which includes such rights as receiving messages, deleting queues, and setting queue properties. 此构造函数使用传递中设置此实例的权限属性。The constructor uses the rights you pass in to set this instance's property. 有关授予或拒绝权限的详细信息，请参阅主题。For more information about granting or denying rights, see the topic. 为两个成员，`Allow`和`Deny`，可能有预先存在的并可能矛盾访问权限，因此权限队列的自由访问控制列表 (DACL) 中出现的顺序会影响是否最终授予的权限.For two members, `Allow` and `Deny`, there may be preexisting and possibly contradictory access rights, so the order in which the rights appear in the queue's discretionary access control list (DACL) affects whether the right is ultimately granted. 两个其他成员、`Set`和`Revoke`，覆盖任何现有权限。Two other members, `Set` and `Revoke`, overwrite any existing rights. 使用其行为是适用于你的应用程序的成员。Use the member whose behavior is applicable to your application. 传递的此实例直接插入的重载方法可以授予或拒绝权限仅对该受信者，或添加到此实例之前调用以授予或拒绝向多个受信者的权限一次。Pass this instance of directly into an overload of the method to grant or deny rights only to this trustee, or add this instance to a before calling to grant or deny rights to multiple trustees at once.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Messaging::MessageQueueAccessRights MessageQueueAccessRights { System::Messaging::MessageQueueAccessRights get(); void set(System::Messaging::MessageQueueAccessRights value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置应用于该受信者的消息队列特定的权限集。

span.span: Gets or sets the set of Message Queuing-specific rights to apply to the trustee.
A bitwise combination of the members.

value.span: 默认值是由传入构造函数的 参数定义的。

span.span: The default is defined by the parameter passed into the constructor.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性使您能够指定消息队列对象特定的权限，如接收、 扫视、 或写入消息，或设置队列属性。The property enables you to specify Message Queuing object-specific rights such as receiving, peeking, or writing messages, or setting queue properties. 此属性的值将由构造函数，但您可以更改它之前使用的此实例的任何时候对的调用中。The value of this property is set by the constructor, but you can change it at any time before using this instance of in a call to .
